blocks.name: ordtbaslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ordtbas . In a total order, unbounded-above intervals are closed under intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cordt, c0), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))))))

  -| wceq(c4, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)

  sneqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5eq(crn(cun(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), cun(c3, c4), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rnun(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  uneq12d(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), c3, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), c3, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  syl6eqr(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), c4, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cdm(cv(hs0)), c2, cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  df-ordt(hs0, s0, s1)
  fvex(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)

}

thm ordtval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(ordTop ` c0)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }))
  ⊣ c4 = ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(ordTop ` c0)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(ordTop ` c0)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))))), d(s0, c2))
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (ordTop ` c0)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cordt, (topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))), (topGen `(fi `({ dom(hs0)} ⋃ ran(((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })⋃(s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 })))))))
  fveq2d(ctg, (fi `({ dom(hs0)} ⋃ ran(((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })⋃(s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }))))), (fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cfi, ({ dom(hs0)} ⋃ ran(((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })⋃(s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 })))), ({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)), hs0 = c0)
  uneq12d({ dom(hs0)}, ran(((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })⋃(s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }))), { c2 }, (c3 ⋃ c4), hs0 = c0)
  sneqd(dom(hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl5eq(ran(((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })⋃(s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }))), (c3 ⋃ c4), (ran((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 }))⋃ ran((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }))), hs0 = c0)
  rnun((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 }), (s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }))
  uneq12d(ran((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })), ran((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 })), c3, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(ran((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 })), c3, ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 })), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 }), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }), hs0 = c0)
  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(hs0), { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s1[hs0]s0 }, c2, { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }, hs0 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(s1, dom(hs0), c2, hs0 = c0, ¬ s1[hs0]s0, ¬ s1[c0]s0)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, s1[hs0]s0, s1[c0]s0)
  breq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  syl6eqr(ran((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 })), c4, ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 })), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((s0 ∈ dom(hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }), hs0 = c0)
  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(hs0), { s1 ∈ dom(hs0)| ¬ s0[hs0]s1 }, c2, { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }, hs0 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(s1, dom(hs0), c2, hs0 = c0, ¬ s0[hs0]s1, ¬ s0[c0]s1)
  syl6eqr(dom(hs0), c2, dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, s0[hs0]s1, s0[c0]s1)
  breq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  df-ordt(hs0, s0, s1)
  fvex(ctg, (fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.content: Value of the order topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)

thm ordtuni(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cuni(cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cuni(cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cuni(cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  syl6eqr(c2, cuni(cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))), cun(cuni(csn(c2)), cuni(cun(c3, c4))), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqtr2d(c2, cun(cuni(csn(c2)), cuni(cun(c3, c4))), cun(c2, cuni(cun(c3, c4))), wcel(c0, c1))
  uneq1d(cuni(csn(c2)), cuni(cun(c3, c4)), c2, wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(csn(c2)), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  unisng(c2, universe)
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, cuni(cun(c3, c4))), c2), wss(cuni(cun(c3, c4)), c2))
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cuni(cun(c3, c4)), c2), wss(cun(c3, c4), cpw(c2)))
  unssd(c3, c4, cpw(c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5eqss(c3, cpw(c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  frnd(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), cpw(c2), c2, wcel(c0, c1))
  fmpttd(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), cpw(c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), cpw(c2)), wss(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), c2))
  ssrab2(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wcel(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), cpw(c2)), wss(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  elpw2g(c2, universe, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl5eqss(c4, cpw(c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  frnd(cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), cpw(c2), c2, wcel(c0, c1))
  fmpttd(s0, c2, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cpw(c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cpw(c2)), wss(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), c2))
  ssrab2(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wcel(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cpw(c2)), wss(crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, cdm(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  dmexg(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c2, universe, crab(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  sspwuni(cun(c3, c4), c2)
  ssequn2(cuni(cun(c3, c4)), c2)
  uniun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm ordtuni(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = ⋃({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }))
  ⊣ c4 = ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = ⋃({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = ⋃({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))), d(s1, c0))
  syl6eqr(c2, ⋃({ c2 } ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)), (⋃ { c2 } ⋃ ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ c1)
  eqtr2d(c2, (⋃ { c2 } ⋃ ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)), (c2 ⋃ ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ c1)
  uneq1d(⋃ { c2 }, ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4), c2, c0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ { c2 } = c2, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  unisng(c2, universe)
  sylib(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ⋃ ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4))= c2, ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)⊆ c2)
  sylib(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃(c3 ⋃ c4)⊆ c2, (c3 ⋃ c4)⊆ P(c2))
  unssd(c3, c4, P(c2), c0 ∈ c1)
  syl5eqss(c3, P(c2), ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 })), c0 ∈ c1)
  frnd((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }), P(c2), c2, c0 ∈ c1)
  fmpttd(s0, c2, { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }, P(c2), c0 ∈ c1)
  mpbiri((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 } ∈ P(c2), { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 } ⊆ c2)
  ssrab2(s1, c2, ¬ s1[c0]s0)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), ({ s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 } ∈ P(c2)↔ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 } ⊆ c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elpw2g(c2, universe, { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 })
  syl5eqss(c4, P(c2), ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 })), c0 ∈ c1)
  frnd((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }), P(c2), c2, c0 ∈ c1)
  fmpttd(s0, c2, { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }, P(c2), c0 ∈ c1)
  mpbiri((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 } ∈ P(c2), { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 } ⊆ c2)
  ssrab2(s1, c2, ¬ s0[c0]s1)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), ({ s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 } ∈ P(c2)↔ { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 } ⊆ c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ c2, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, dom(c0), c0 ∈ c1)
  dmexg(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c2, universe, { s1 ∈ c2 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 })
  sspwuni((c3 ⋃ c4), c2)
  ssequn2(⋃(c3 ⋃ c4), c2)
  uniun({ c2 }, (c3 ⋃ c4))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: ordtbas2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ordtbas . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtbas2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctsr), wceq(cfv(cfi, cun(c1, c2)), cun(cun(c1, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c4, crab(s1, c4, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c4, crab(s1, c4, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpo(s2, s3, c4, c4, crab(s1, c4, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wn(wbr(cv(s3), c0, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
} = {

blocks.name: ordtbas
blocks.content: In a total order, the finite intersections of the open rays generates the set of open intervals, but no more - these four collections form a subbasis for the order topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctsr), wceq(cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3))), cun(cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)), c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, crn(cmpo(s2, s3, c1, c1, crab(s1, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wn(wbr(cv(s3), c0, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
} = {
  syl6eqr(cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3))), cun(cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)), c4), cun(csn(c1), cun(cun(c2, c3), c4)), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  eqssd(cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3))), cun(csn(c1), cun(cun(c2, c3), c4)), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3))), cun(csn(c1), cun(cun(c2, c3), c4)), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, ctsr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(csn(c1), cun(cun(c2, c3), c4))), w3o(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, cun(c2, c3))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cfi, csn(c1)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, ctsr), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)))), w3o(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, cun(c2, c3))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cfi, csn(c1)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))), wcel(csn(c1), universe), wcel(cun(c2, c3), universe))
  snex(c1)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, ctsr), wcel(cun(c2, c3), universe), wss(cun(c2, c3), cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3))), wcel(cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)), universe))
  ssexg(cun(c2, c3), cun(csn(c1), cun(c2, c3)), universe)
  elfiun(hs1, hs2, csn(c1), universe, cun(c2, c3), universe, cv(hs0))
  3jaod(wcel(c0, ctsr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, cun(c2, c3))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cfi, csn(c1)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(csn(c1), cun(cun(c2, c3), c4))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ctsr), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(csn(c1), cun(cun(c2, c3), c4)))))

thm ordtbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TosetRel →(fi `({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)))=(({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3))⋃ c4))
  ⊣ c1 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s1[c0]s0 }))
  ⊣ c3 = ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 | ¬ s0[c0]s1 }))
  ⊣ c4 = ran((s2 ∈ c1, s3 ∈ c1 ↦ { s1 ∈ c1 |(¬ s1[c0]s2 ∧ ¬ s3[c0]s1)}))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

  ⊣ d(s1, c0)

  ⊣ d(s3, c0)

  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
} = {
  syl6eqr((fi `({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3))), (({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3))⋃ c4), ({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)

  sylancr(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (hs0 ∈(fi `({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)))↔(hs0 ∈(fi ` { c1 })∨ hs0 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3))∨ ∃(hs1 ∈(fi ` { c1 }), ∃(hs2 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ hs2))))), { c1 } ∈ 𝕌, (c2 ⋃ c3)∈ 𝕌)

  3jaod(c0 ∈ TosetRel, hs0 ∈(fi ` { c1 }), hs0 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), ∃(hs1 ∈(fi ` { c1 }), ∃(hs2 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ hs2))), hs0 ∈({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)))

  eqsstri((fi ` { c1 }), ({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)), { c1 })
  ssun1({ c1 }, ((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4))
  sseld(hs0, (fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), ({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  rexlimdvva(hs1, hs2, (fi ` { c1 }), (fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), c0 ∈ TosetRel, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ hs2), hs0 ∈({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ TosetRel ∧(hs1 ∈(fi ` { c1 })∧ hs2 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)))), hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ hs2), hs0 ∈({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)), (hs1 ⋂ hs2)∈({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)))

  syl5sseqr(⋃(c2 ⋃ c3), c1, ⋃({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  unissi((c2 ⋃ c3), ({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)))
  syl((c0 ∈ TosetRel ∧(hs1 ∈(fi ` { c1 })∧ hs2 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)))), hs1 = c1, hs1 ∈ { c1 })
  syl6eleq(hs1, { c1 }, (fi ` { c1 }), (c0 ∈ TosetRel ∧(hs1 ∈(fi ` { c1 })∧ hs2 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)))))
  simprl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, hs1 ∈(fi ` { c1 }), hs2 ∈(fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)))
  fisn(c1)

  sselda(hs2, (fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), ({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  syl6eqss((fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), ({ c1 } ⋃((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4)), ((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  ssun2(((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4), { c1 })

  ssfii(({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3)), universe)
  eqsstr3d(((c2 ⋃ c3)⋃ c4), (fi `({ c1 } ⋃(c2 ⋃ c3))), (fi `(c2 ⋃ c3)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  ordtbas2(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c2, c3, c4, c1)

  tgtopon(cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crab(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)))))), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crab(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))))))))

blocks.name: ordtrest
blocks.content: The subspace topology of an order topology is in general finer than the topology generated by the restricted order, but we do have inclusion in one direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: ordtrest2
blocks.content: An interval-closed set ` A ` in a total order has the same subspace topology as the restricted order topology. (An interval-closed set is the same thing as an open or half-open or closed interval in ` RR ` , but in other sets like ` QQ ` there are interval-closed sets like ` ( _pi , +oo ) i^i QQ ` that are not intervals.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

thm ordtrest2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(ordTop `(c0 ⋂(c1 × c1)))=((ordTop ` c0)[|`t]c1))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ { s2 ∈ c2 |(s0[c0]s2 ∧ s2[c0]s1)} ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqssd((ordTop `(c0 ⋂(c1 × c1))), ((ordTop ` c0)[|`t]c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (ordTop `(c0 ⋂(c1 × c1)))⊆((ordTop ` c0)[|`t]c1), c0 ∈ PosetRel, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ordtrest(c0, c1, universe)

  eqtr4d(((ordTop ` c0)[|`t]c1), (topGen `((fi `({ c2 } ⋃(ran((s2 ∈ c2 ↦ { hs0 ∈ c2 | ¬ hs0[c0]s2 }))⋃ ran((s2 ∈ c2 ↦ { hs0 ∈ c2 | ¬ s2[c0]hs0 })))))[|`t]c1)), ((topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ⋃(ran((s2 ∈ c2 ↦ { hs0 ∈ c2 | ¬ hs0[c0]s2 }))⋃ ran((s2 ∈ c2 ↦ { hs0 ∈ c2 | ¬ s2[c0]hs0 }))))))[|`t]c1), w0)

thm leordtvallem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  rneqi(cmpt(s0, cxr, co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, cxr, crab(s1, cxr, wn(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, cxr, co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf), crab(s1, cxr, wn(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  syl5eqr(co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf), crab(s1, cxr, wn(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), cin(cxr, co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  mpbi(wceq(cin(cxr, co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf)), co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf)), wss(co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf), cxr))
  iocssxr(cv(s0), cpnf)
  sseqin2(co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf), cxr)
  rabbi2dva(s1, cxr, co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  3bitr2d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr)), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cxr), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cpnf)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cioc, cpnf)), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cxr), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cpnf))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))

  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cxr), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cpnf)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cxr), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cpnf)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cxr), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cpnf)))
  jccir(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr)), wcel(cv(s1), cxr), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cpnf))

} = {

  rgen2a(hs0, hs2, cxr, wcel(crab(hs1, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs2)))), cfv(ccld, cfv(cordt, cle))))

  letsr()
  ordtcld3(hs1, cle, ctsr, cv(hs0), cxr, cv(hs2))
  ledm()
  fmpt2(hs0, hs2, cxr, cxr, crab(hs1, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs2)))), cfv(ccld, cfv(cordt, cle)), cicc)
  df-icc(hs0, hs2, hs1)
  ax-mp(wcel(emptycls, cfv(ccld, cfv(cordt, cle))), wcel(cfv(cordt, cle), ctop))
  letop()

  ssun1(cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))), crn(cioo))

  mpbir(wcel(cun(cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))), crn(cioo)), ctb), wcel(cfv(ctg, cun(cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))), crn(cioo))), ctop))
  eqeltrri(cfv(ctg, cun(cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))), crn(cioo))), ctop, cfv(cordt, cle))

blocks.name: reordt
blocks.content: The real numbers are an open set in the topology of the extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: lecldbas
blocks.content: The set of closed intervals forms a closed subbasis for the topology on the extended reals. Since our definition of a basis is in terms of open sets, we express this by showing that the complements of closed intervals form an open subbasis for the topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lecldbas(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cordt, cle), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, crn(c0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, crn(cicc), cdif(cxr, cv(s0))))
} = {
  eqssi(cfv(cordt, cle), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, crn(c0))))
  eqsstri(cfv(cordt, cle), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, crn(c0))), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))))))
  leordtval2(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))))
  eqid(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0)))))
  mp2an(wss(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))))), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, crn(c0)))), wcel(cfv(cfi, crn(c0)), universe), wss(cfv(cfi, cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0)))))), cfv(cfi, crn(c0))))
  fvex(cfi, crn(c0))
  mp2an(wss(cfv(cfi, cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0)))))), cfv(cfi, crn(c0))), wcel(crn(c0), universe), wss(cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0))))), crn(c0)))
  ssexi(crn(c0), cfv(cordt, cle))
  fvex(cordt, cle)
  unssi(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cmnf, cico, cv(hs0)))), crn(c0))
  ax-mp(wss(crn(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), crn(c0)), wf(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), cxr, crn(c0)))
  fmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), cxr, crn(c0), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cxr, co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, crn(cicc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf), cdif(cxr, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wrex(s0, crn(cicc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf), cdif(cxr, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), crn(cicc)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf), cdif(cxr, co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)))))
  mp3an12(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), crn(cicc)), wfn(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  fnovrn(cicc, cxr, cxr, cmnf, cv(hs0))
  eqcomd(co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf), cdif(cxr, co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  mpbid(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(cdif(cxr, co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), wceq(cun(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), cxr))
  syl6eq(cun(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), cxr, co(cmnf, cicc, cpnf), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  syl32anc(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(cun(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), co(cmnf, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wbr(cmnf, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))
  ixxun(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, cmnf, cv(hs0), cpnf, cle, cle, cicc, cioc, cicc, cle, cle, clt, cle)
  xrletr(cv(hs4), cv(hs0), cpnf)
  syld(w3a(wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs4), cxr)), wa(wbr(cmnf, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs4))), wbr(cmnf, cle, cv(hs4)), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs4)))
  xrlelttr(cmnf, cv(hs0), cv(hs4))

  xrltle(cmnf, cv(hs4))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wb(wceq(cun(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), cxr), wceq(cdif(cxr, co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf))), wss(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), cxr), wceq(cin(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), emptycls))
  iccssxr(cmnf, cv(hs0))
  mp3an13(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(cin(co(cmnf, cicc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cioc, cpnf)), emptycls), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  ixxdisj(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, cmnf, cv(hs0), cpnf, cicc, cioc, cle, cle, clt, cle)
  df-ioc(hs1, hs2, hs3)
  xrltnle(cv(hs0), cv(hs4))

blocks.name: pnfnei
blocks.content: A neighborhood of ` +oo ` contains an unbounded interval based at a real number. Together with ~ xrtgioo (which describes neighborhoods of ` RR ` ) and ~ mnfnei , this gives all "negative" topological information ensuring that it is not too fine (and of course ~ iooordt and similar ensure that it has all the sets we want). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ordtrestixx
blocks.content: The restriction of the less than order to an interval gives the same topology as the subspace topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtrestixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(cle, cxp(c0, c0))))

  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wss(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mptru(wceq(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(cle, cxp(c0, c0)))))
  eqcomd(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(cle, cxp(c0, c0))), wtru)
  ordtrest2(s0, s1, hs0, cle, c0, cxr, wtru)
  ledm()
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cle, ctsr))
  letsr()
  a1i(wtru, wss(c0, cxr))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), c0))
  eqsstr3d(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), c0, co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))
  sseli(cv(s0), c0, cxr)
  sseli(cv(s1), c0, cxr)
  iccval(hs0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ordtrestixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((ordTop ` ≤)[|`t]c0)=(ordTop `(≤ ⋂(c0 × c0)))
  ⊣ c0 ⊆ ℝ*
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(s0[[,]]s1)⊆ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mptru(((ordTop ` ≤)[|`t]c0)=(ordTop `(≤ ⋂(c0 × c0))))
  eqcomd(((ordTop ` ≤)[|`t]c0), (ordTop `(≤ ⋂(c0 × c0))), wtru)
  ordtrest2(s0, s1, hs0, cle, c0, cxr, wtru)
  ledm()
  a1i(wtru, ≤ ∈ TosetRel)
  letsr()
  a1i(wtru, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  adantl(wtru, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1)} ⊆ c0)
  eqsstr3d({ hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1)}, c0, (s0[[,]]s1), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  syl2an(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, (s0[[,]]s1)= { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]s1)}, s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ*)
  sseli(s0, c0, cxr)
  sseli(s1, c0, cxr)
  iccval(hs0, s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
}

blocks.name: ordtresticc
blocks.content: The restriction of the less than order to a closed interval gives the same topology as the subspace topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
